content:
@Alya Abbott this is how the organisation profile looks like after fixing the alignment issues.

alignment-fixes.png

Most of the alignment issues were solved when following @Tim Abbott 's suggestion to share the CSS between Profile Avatar widget and other image upload widgets. This results in continuity between all of the image upload widgets.
Raised PR #21430 with the above mentioned fixes and the refactoring of image_upload_widget.css (which was required in order to fix the issue without the duplication of code)

I like that this deduplicates the CSS for the components: I've been wanting us to do that for a while. But this probably also means we need pretty extensive QA on the changes. @Aman Agrawal (amanagr) I'd appreciate if you can do a review on this one since I likely won't have time before tomorrow.
